SEARCH
Package linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.controller

Class IngredientController

java.lang.Object
linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.controller.IngredientController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${app.endpoint.ingredients}") @Validated public class IngredientController extends Object
REST controller for managing ingredients. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations on ingredients.

Annotations: - @AllArgsConstructor: Generates a constructor with 1 parameter for each field in the class. - @RestController: Indicates that this class is a REST controller. - @RequestMapping: Specifies the base URL for all endpoints in this controller. - @Validated: Enables validation for the controller.

Methods: - getAllCategories(String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves all ingredients with pagination. - getCategoriesByNameContaining(String name, String mode, int page, int size): Retrieves ingredients by name containing a string with pagination. - getIngredientById(String id): Retrieves an ingredient by its ID. - getIngredientsByIds(List ids): Retrieves ingredients by a list of IDs. - getIngredientByName(String name): Retrieves an ingredient by its name, case insensitive. - createIngredient(IngredientDto ingredientDto): Creates a new ingredient. - createCategories(Flux ingredients): Creates multiple ingredients. - deleteIngredientById(String id): Deletes an ingredient by its ID. - deleteAllCategories(): Deletes all ingredients.

See Also:

    • getAllCategories

      @GetMapping public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<IngredientDto>> getAllCategories(@RequestParam(required=false) String mode, @RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size)
      Retrieves all ingredients with pagination.
      Parameters:
      mode - The sorting mode.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a Page of IngredientDto objects.

    • getCategoriesByNameContaining

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.by-name}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<IngredientDto>> getCategoriesByNameContaining(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam(required=false) String mode, @RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size)
      Retrieves ingredients by name containing a string with pagination.
      Parameters:
      name - The string to search for within ingredient names.
      mode - The sorting mode.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      size - The number of items per page.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a Page of IngredientDto objects.

    • getIngredientById

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.id.path-variable-id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<IngredientDto> getIngredientById(@PathVariable String id)
      Retrieves an ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting the IngredientDto object, or an error if not found.

    • getIngredientsByIds

      @PostMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.by-ids}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Map<String,Object>> getIngredientsByIds(@RequestBody List<String> ids)
      Retrieves ingredients by a list of IDs.
      Parameters:
      ids - The list of IDs of the ingredients to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a map containing found ingredients and not found IDs.

    • getIngredientByName

      @GetMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.name.path-variable-name}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<IngredientDto> getIngredientByName(@PathVariable String name)

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting the IngredientDto object, or an error if not found.

    • createCategories

      Creates multiple ingredients.
      Parameters:
      ingredients - The flux of ingredients to create.
      Returns:
      A Flux emitting the created IngredientDto objects.

    • deleteIngredientById

      @DeleteMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.path-variable-id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> deleteIngredientById(@PathVariable String id)
      Deletes an ingredient by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the ingredient to delete.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting a message indicating the ingredient has been deleted, or an error if not found.

    • deleteAllCategories

      @DeleteMapping("${app.sub-endpoint.all}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<Void> deleteAllCategories()
      Deletes all ingredients.
      Returns:
      A Mono indicating completion of the deletion process.
